title: Crash Won’t Stop Chloé Dygert: Committed to Start Road Race, Team Pursuit
content:
'She's a competitor:' Dygert coach Kristin Armstrong confirms the US star will start next Sunday's road race and team pursuit on the track despite crashing hard.

Read the full article at Crash Won’t Stop Chloé Dygert: Committed to Start Road Race, Team Pursuit on Velo.
author: ahood
